metadata.title: CVE-2024-42097 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: emux: improve patch ioctl data validationIn load_data(), make the validation of and skipping over the main infoblock match that in load_guspatch().In load_guspatch(), add checking that the specified patch length matchesthe actually supplied data, like load_data() already did.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
